setBigContentTitle(java.lang.CharSequenc.Description: Overrides ContentTitle in the big form of the template. This defaults to the value passed to setContentTitle().

addLine(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Append a line to the digest section of the Inbox notification.

setSummaryText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the first line of text after the detail section in the big form of the template.

ClassDesc: Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include a list of (up to 5) strings. If the platform does not provide large-format notifications, this method has no effect. The user will always see the normal notification view. This class is a "rebuilder": It attaches to a Builder object and modifies its behavior, like so:
